definitions.definition: A quantity obtained by addition or aggregation .
( often plural ) An arithmetic computation, especially one posed to a student as an exercise (not necessarily limited to addition ).
examples: We're learning about division, and the sums are tricky.

definitions.definition: A summary ; the principal points or thoughts when viewed together; the substance .
examples: This is the sum of all the evidence in the case.
This is the sum and substance of his objections.

definitions.definition: A central idea or point; gist .
( rare or literary ) The utmost degree; the greatest or most perfect realization (of some concept).
( obsolete ) An old English measure of corn equal to the quarter .

main_definition: A quantity obtained by addition or aggregation .
secondary_definitions: ( often plural ) An arithmetic computation, especially one posed to a student as an exercise (not necessarily limited to addition ).
A summary ; the principal points or thoughts when viewed together; the substance .
A central idea or point; gist .
( rare or literary ) The utmost degree; the greatest or most perfect realization (of some concept).
( obsolete ) An old English measure of corn equal to the quarter .

definitions.definition: The basic unit of money in Kyrgyzstan .
The basic unit of money in Uzbekistan .

main_definition: The basic unit of money in Kyrgyzstan .
secondary_definitions: The basic unit of money in Uzbekistan .

definitions.definition: A type of administrative district used in China, Mongolia, and Russia. In Mongolia, a sum is smaller than a province . In China, it is only used in Inner Mongolia , where it is equivalent to a township .

main_definition: A type of administrative district used in China, Mongolia, and Russia. In Mongolia, a sum is smaller than a province . In China, it is only used in Inner Mongolia , where it is equivalent to a township .
